title: TINY BOOKS
content:
Bob Pool writes about Barbara Raheb, a publisher of tiny books who is losing her vision. Inspiring craft and dedication, sad story.   
   
 [http://www.latimes.com/la-me-vision25aug25.story](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022131727/http:/www.latimes.com/la-me-vision25aug25.story)
author: beejay
